#include "iostream"
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    short int T;
    cin>>T;
		getchar();
    while(T)
    {
        string a;
				int ans = 0;
        getline(cin,a);
        for(int i = 0; i < a.length() ; i ++ )
        {
						char X = a[i];
						char Y = a[i+1];
						char P = a[i+3];
						char Q = a[i+4];

						if( X == Q && Y == P)
							ans++;

						else if( X == P && Y == Q)
							ans++;

						else if( X == Y && P == Q)
							ans++;

						i = i + 5;
        }
        cout<<ans<<"\n";
        T--;
    }
    return 0;
}
